title: Cloze deletion for code chunks
content: Just realized how overpowered type-in-the-answer cloze deletion cards are for memorizing code patterns [[2024-03-11-anki-for-internalization-of-nuggets]] and further adding in [[thought-3]]

title: Have Claude generate question answer pairs for 1000 word chunks
content: If you're reading a book, and it feels pointless because you'll forget most of it soon then just put it in claude and generate a document in the format [question] | [answer]. Works great with that article on [[2024-07-25-get-your-hands-dirty-with-chatgpt]]
